value.title: Fintech Ecosystems — Some Assembly Required
value.excerpt: And, as financial institutions look to build ecosystems to analyze fintechs thoroughly, it seems some assembly is required. Although the agencies did not mandate compliance, their involvement means those seeking to upgrade a bank or credit union’s technology may choose to avoid the risks or take a chance to be more competitive.
